Not sure that anyone deserves 'good riddance', but I can't deny that (from the article, at least) he seemed to be a shrewd opponent of gay rights...
Not partying, but I shall not weep either. Helms was a first class creep - a racist and a sexist as well as a homophobe.
I will not say anything but this, We are free from his shadow of hate and I am glad he will never be able to hurt another gay person.

We aren't really free from the legacy of Jesse Helms's hatred. That is still very much with us. However, it might as well be admitted that Helms was as much of a victim as the people he brutally victimised. People have to learn that kind of hatred, and one doesn't have to look far for its source in Helms's case: it's the religious, fundamentalist Southern society he was raised in. He was taught to hate blacks and gays. Perhaps he made some strides in overcoming his racism, I don't know, but he was a long way from overcoming his homophobia.

People have to learn that kind of hatred, and one doesn't have to look far for its source in Helms's case: it's the religious, fundamentalist Southern society he was raised in.  Very true. we all evolved in different ponds so to speak. This country needs to wake up and seek enlightenment, unfortunatley, there will always be hatred in the world.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Jesse Helms dies
